text: 11:34 Gumazir Dapaniba 15:8; 15:15; 1 Atriviba 19:3; 2 Atriviba 20:7; Daniel 3:1-30Egha me avir dafabagh amizɨ da mungue. Ezɨ mɨdorozir sababa itir gumaziba me mɨsoghasava amima, me men are. Egha me gavgavir ekiaba puvatɨgha, gɨn me gavgavim ini. Egha me mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavibar otivigha, igharaz darazir modorozir gumazibar agɨntɨgha me mɨsogha me abɨni.
